thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Southcross Energy Partners L.P. Reports Qtrly Basic And Diluted Loss Per Subordinated Unit $0.21

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Southcross Energy Partners L.P. Reports Qtrly Basic And Diluted Loss Per Subordinated Unit $0.21
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Southcross Energy Partners Lp:
* SOUTHCROSS ENERGY PARTNERS, L.P. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS
* SOUTHCROSS ENERGY PARTNERS LP QTRLY BASIC AND DILUTED LOSS PER SUBORDINATED UNIT $0.21
* SOUTHCROSS ENERGY PARTNERS LP QUARTERLY TOTAL REVENUES $172.0 MILLION VERSUS $159.7 MILLION
* SOUTHCROSS ENERGY PARTNERS LP - PROCESSED GAS VOLUMES DURING ATR AVERAGED 255 MMCF/D, DOWN 11% COMPARED TO 287 MMCF/D FOR SAME PERIOD IN PRIOR YEAR Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
